addy.bio: Addy {i}loves{/i} Christmas. It's the only time of the year they look forward to changing outfits. Unfortunately, they love their parties more than they love their friends, so they couldn't make it to CS' party.

anne.bio: Been 'round for some time. Still has her Union uniform and Army saber! Lives in New York city in a small apartment with Grace. Works for Elizabeth and is married to Grace.

anno.bio: Anno is one of CS' best friends. He's always there to help CS out with livestreams, audio editing... and when he needs help decorating, too, apparently. He's also an avid fan of Nirvana.

arceus.quote: I'm literally a hacker, guys! uwu
arceus.bio: The master hacker and technician himself, Arceus has a lot of tricks up his sleeve. He could do anything he wanted, if he could only be arsed. Despite being Jewish, he's still excited to celebrate Christmas with all of his friends. As a bonus, Hanukkah and Christmas just happen to overlap this year!

aria.bio: Aria knows her shit. Whether it's book smarts or street smarts, she's got it all. Despite her mindbogglingly busy schedule, she always makes some time for her friends from DPN. Luckily, she could make it to this party, too. Her ability to teleport is coming in clutch!

avgn.quote: This is a huge load of fuck shit!
avgn.bio: More commonly known as {i}The Angry Video Game Nerd{/i}, he plans to take you back to the past, to play the shitty games that suck ass. He loves to scream and swear, and he fucking {i}despises{/i} Bugs Bunny.

billy.bio: Billy loves a good holiday get-together! He's been itching to make a big batch of Big City Sliders for some time now. What better place to do that than at his good friend CS' Christmas party?

blank.bio: Ever needed music that's also a shitpost? No? Well, too bad, because Blank has ya covered. They {i}can{/i} make regular music, but it isn't {i}Blank{/i} music if it doesn't sample catgirl moans. They're a little annoyed about having to share the sound system with Nova, though.

carguy.bio: No matter how high the snow piles up, Carguy has just the product for you! He'll gladly demonstrate Crotch Doctor's amazing snow-melting technology... as long as he remembers to pick up some more from Walmart's Auto Center before going door-to-door.

copguy.quote: You're headin' to the slammer, bucko.
copguy.bio: Copguy knows that crime is statistically higher on Christmas Eve, so he really just wanted to keep working through the holiday. However, he has no choice but to (sometimes maliciously) comply with his boss' demands.

cs.bio: The main man himself! He's back to get all his friends together and spread some holiday cheer. He even bought a new outfit for the occasion!

db.bio: Db05 is a busy man, but who can blame him? He has places to be, things to see, and most importantly, he has to feed his pets.

digi.quote: But, here's the thing though, right?
digi.bio: Digi showed up to this party in a spaceship. What were they doing in {i}space?{/i} What {i}does{/i} Digi do on a daily basis? The answer is "too much stuff, really." They brought their new projector for a holiday movie night, but they've never actually successfully set it up before.

ed.quote: We make sure to get the JoJ done right, the first time.
ed.bio: The CEO of HoH SiS. He agreed to come to CS' Christmas party in hopes of drumming up some good PR for the company, especially after the incident. Perhaps he'll even pick up some new clients among CS' friends.

eliza.bio: Been 'round for a bit less than Anne and Grace. Served her country proud! Started as boots-on-the-ground and worked her way up through the Air Force. Last spotted doing an undercover mission in the Soviet Union, 1986. Mostly a loner who directs Anne and Grace.

ges.bio: As seen on TV. This lanky figure is here to have a good time and talk about history. Quite fun, eh? He came all the way from Canada alongside Nova. He {i}definitely{/i} knows cs188, too. Totally. So, that's a plus!

grace.bio: Been 'round for some time. Still has her cowboy hat and six-shooter. Trying to rebuild her gun collection after having to sell it all to avoid complete bankruptcy after the AG&A Co. situation. Happily married to Anne.

iris.bio: The bio didn't load correctly. Ask Digi to fix the game.

k17.bio: This silly creature is the embodiment of Pakoo's memories from 2017. They're a hard worker, but they only have about three things ever to talk about: SunnyD, {i}Nekopara,{/i} and CS.

k22.bio: While K-22 doesn't like to bring it up, they are {i}obsessed{/i} with Addy. They like to talk to Addy all the time, help them out with any problems they might have, and is only really happy when they're around. All K-22 wanted was to stay home on Christmas Eve...

kitty.quote: So, there's this plushie I saw.
kitty.bio: Arceus' partner of many years. While she's happy to meet Arc's friends, she didn't expect there to be quite so many of them. She just wants to find a quiet corner to chill out in.

linus.bio: Linus is the CEO of Linus Tech Tips and of Linus Media Group. This man really loves his tech, so much that his entire life revolves around it. Even so, he can never seem to handle any kind of device without dropping it... much like he can never seem to handle this segue to our sponsor!

luke.bio: Luke, also known as the Floatplane guy, is Linus' right-hand man. He works a little too hard for Linus' liking. He also apparently has a family.

mean_human.quote: Damn, you're all so {i}short{/i} from up here.
mean_human.bio: Mean is a close friend of Tate. He loves trains and wants to share the joy of railroading with everyone he meets. He {i}also{/i} loves Christmas, mostly because of the gifts and food, but also because he can cosplay as Santa. He can't wait to watch {i}The Polar Express{/i} again.

michael.bio: This esteemed poet just {i}loves{/i} hot food, especially a well-mashed potato!

mike.bio: This pizzapotamus can often be spotted giving away free samples of pizza from his pizza Thermos. Works at the bus stop.

nova.bio: After getting CS' invitation, Nova figured that, sure, maybe they could visit CS one more time. They've been mostly excited to show off their newest track to a bunch of people. They're not too thrilled with having to share the spotlight with Blank, though.

obama.bio: A jolly politician enjoying his... {i}fourth{/i} term? Not sure anyone's even still counting at this point. While the president was surprised to have been invited to CS' party, he is more than happy to have an excuse to step out of the White House for a few hours. He also makes a {i}mean{/i} carrot cake.

pomni.quote: There's got to be an exit somewhere...
pomni.bio: After escaping from IKEA's flagship location in Sweden, Pomni has found herself trapped in a Target in the US. She's secretly grateful to have seen a familiar face, even if CS can't remember her...

rich.bio: In spite of everything that's happened, Richard doesn't really hold a grudge towards CS. He'd probably have come to this party even {i}if{/i} his boss didn't tell him to.

round.bio: Our KENJI (Not sponsored) Yabu Brown Round Cat is a gorgeously soft and squidgy Kawaii plush friend. Velvety soft and squishy, our collectable plush toys are made from high-quality super-soft materials that make them perfect for snuggling. Super-soft and squidgy, our lovable huggable KENJI (Not sponsored) Yabu is the softest and cutest Japanese-inspired Kawaii plushie around. Meow!

santa.bio:
The personification of holiday cheer. Every year, he travels the world on the night before Christmas to give gifts to all the children (and, perhaps, to sample some cookies and milk).

Many people wonder how one man can visit every house in a single night. Have you {i}seen{/i} speedrunners? Santa might just be the {i}original{/i} speedrunner. He has to know some {i}insane{/i} glitches to be able to hit every house before dawn!

sheriff.quote: I need pictures of CS, ASAP!
sheriff.bio: Normally, the Sheriff enjoys the holidays. He was really looking forward to this party, too, but today just {i}isn't{/i} his day, no thanks to Copguy. Maybe he should have just stayed at work and taken the holiday bonus.

tgt_worker.quote: Yeah, let me help you out.
tgt_worker.bio: Your average Target employee who looks like he's had enough customer interactions for the year. Although he probably hates working at the self-checkout, it looks like he's really just waiting for someone to come cover for him so he can take his lunch break.

tate.bio: Tate {i}hates{/i} Christmas. They'd much rather be curled up taking a nap right now. Fortunately, they love their friends more than they hate the holidays, so Mean was able to convince them to attend the party. They {i}really{/i} wish that Mean would've left the fake beard on the train, though.

wesley.bio: After the incident at HoH SiS, Wesley needed back surgery. He's recovering well, but the winter cold doesn't play too well with the new hardware in his spine. It's understandable that he'd be a bit ornery. If it wasn't for Ed's insistence, Wesley would have probably just stayed home.
